title: Dear White People: Slate's Spoiler Special
description:
Slate's Aisha Harris and author Tanner Colby discuss Dear White People.  WARNING: This podcast is meant to be heard AFTER you've seen the movie.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
